title: CA (CA) Trading Near $28.09 Resistance Level
content:
After Thursday’s trading in CA Inc (CA) the algorithms behind MarketIntelligenceCenter.com's Artifical Intelligence Center picked out a trade that offers a 3.97% or 20.68% (for comparison purposes only), while providing 5.63% downside protection.

The trade is a Nov. '15 covered call at the $27.00 level for a net debit of about $25.97. The net debit is also the breakeven point for this trade.

Technical indicators for the stock have been bearish recently and support and resistance have been in the area of $26.99 and $28.09, respectively.
